TopicTitle: It should be possible to put decoupler ON parachute

Articles.Content: Lets say i want to put few capsules on top of each other - in that case i am limited to radial parachutes because decauplers cant be put on central placed parachute.

Inline parachutes would be great. Especially useful when you want to put a single chute and a docking port on a pod.

There are a few mods out there that include inline chutes but I'd like to see them in stock.

I'm currently working on models for stupid_chris's RealChute Parachute Systems add-on, and I'm almost finishing making a special stacked parachute container that might suit the OP's needs.

WIP Images
You can put a cubic octagonal strut on the side of a capsule and attach a conical parachute to that (I needed to make a radial-mounted drogue once, and discovered this trick)

There are in-line parachutes available in the Spherical and Toroidal Tanks mod. At least I think that's where I got them...

That isn't much help is it, sorry, but yeah, inline 'chutes exist, I've used them.
